phrases.pt: Chego aí dentro de dez minutos.
phrases.ru: Я буду там через десять минут.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈʃeɡu ɐˈi ˈdẽtɾu dɨ ˈdeʃ miˈnutuʃ

translations.text: I’ll be there in ten minutes.

phrases.pt: Agora não é um bom momento.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐˈɡɔɾɐ nɐ̃w ɛ ˈũ bõ muˈmẽtu

translations.text: Now is not a good moment.

phrases.pt: Podemos falar disso mais tarde.
phrases.ru: Мы можем поговорить об этом позже.
phrases.ipa_transcription: puˈdẽmuʃ fɐˈlaɾ ˈdisu ˈmajʃ ˈtaɾdɨ

translations.text: We can talk about this later.

phrases.pt: Já estou a caminho.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʒa ʃˈtow ɐ kɐˈmiɲu

translations.text: I’m already on my way.

phrases.pt: Preciso de mais algum tempo.
phrases.ipa_transcription: pɾɨˈsizu dɨ ˈmajʃ ɐɫˈɡũ ˈtẽpu

translations.text: I need a bit more time.

phrases.pt: Isso pode ficar para amanhã.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu ˈpɔdɨ fiˈkaɾ ˈpaɾɐ ɐmɐˈɲɐ̃

translations.text: That can be left for tomorrow.

phrases.pt: Ainda temos tempo para decidir.
phrases.ru: У нас ещё есть время, чтобы решить.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐˈĩdɐ ˈtẽmuʃ ˈtẽpu ˈpaɾɐ dɨsiˈdiɾ

translations.text: We still have time to decide.

phrases.pt: Vou tratar disso assim que puder.
phrases.ru: Я займусь этим, как только смогу.
phrases.ipa_transcription: vo tɾɐˈtaɾ ˈdisu ɐˈsĩ kɨ puˈdeɾ

translations.text: I’ll take care of that as soon as I can.

phrases.pt: Prefiro fazer isso com calma.
phrases.ru: Я предпочитаю сделать это спокойно, без спешки.
phrases.ipa_transcription: pɾɨˈfiɾu fɐˈzeɾ ˈisu kõ ˈkaɫmɐ

translations.text: I prefer to do this calmly.

phrases.pt: Já passou da hora combinada.
phrases.ru: Мы уже вышли за оговорённое время.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʒa pɐˈsou dɐ ˈɔɾɐ kõbĩˈnadɐ

translations.text: We’re already past the agreed time.

phrases.pt: Agora não consigo falar sobre isso.
phrases.ru: Сейчас я не могу об этом говорить.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐˈɡɔɾɐ nɐ̃w kõˈsiɡu fɐˈlaɾ ˈsoβɾɨ ˈisu

translations.text: I can’t talk about this right now.

phrases.pt: Vou chegar um pouco mais tarde.
phrases.ipa_transcription: vo ʃɨˈɡaɾ ˈũ ˈpoku ˈmajʃ ˈtaɾdɨ

translations.text: I’ll arrive a bit later.

phrases.pt: Temos de sair dentro de pouco tempo.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽmuʃ dɨ sɐˈiɾ ˈdẽtɾu dɨ ˈpoku ˈtẽpu

translations.text: We need to leave shortly.

phrases.pt: Já volto, é só um instante.
phrases.ru: Я сейчас вернусь, это буквально на минутку.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʒa ˈβɔɫtu ɛ ˈsɔ ˈũ ĩʃˈtɐ̃tɨ

translations.text: I’ll be right back, just a moment.

phrases.pt: Ainda não estou pronto para isso.
phrases.ru: Я пока не готов(а) к этому.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐˈĩdɐ nɐ̃w ʃˈtow ˈpɾõtu ˈpaɾɐ ˈisu

translations.text: I’m not ready for this yet.

phrases.pt: Vamos com calma, não há pressa.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈvɐmuʃ kõ ˈkaɫmɐ nɐ̃w a ˈpɾɛsɐ

translations.text: Let’s take it easy, there’s no rush.

phrases.pt: Isso vai demorar um pouco mais.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu vaj dɨmuˈɾaɾ ˈũ ˈpoku ˈmajʃ

translations.text: This will take a bit longer.

phrases.pt: Prefiro fazer isso mais tarde.
phrases.ipa_transcription: pɾɨˈfiɾu fɐˈzeɾ ˈisu ˈmajʃ ˈtaɾdɨ

translations.text: I prefer to do this later.

phrases.pt: Já é um pouco tarde para isso.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʒa ɛ ˈũ ˈpoku ˈtaɾdɨ ˈpaɾɐ ˈisu

translations.text: It’s already a bit late for that.

phrases.pt: Ainda estou à espera de uma resposta.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐˈĩdɐ ʃˈtow a ʃpɨˈɾɛsɐ dɨ ˈumɐ ʁɨʃˈpɔʃtɐ

translations.text: I’m still waiting for an answer.

phrases.pt: Podemos adiar isso por enquanto.
phrases.ipa_transcription: puˈdẽmuʃ ɐdjɐˈɾ ˈisu puɾ ĩkwɐ̃ˈtɐ̃w

translations.text: We can postpone this for now.

phrases.pt: Vou precisar de mais alguns minutos.
phrases.ipa_transcription: vo pɾɨsiˈzaɾ dɨ ˈmajʃ ɐɫˈɡũʃ miˈnutuʃ

translations.text: I’ll need a few more minutes.

phrases.pt: Ainda é cedo para tomar essa decisão.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐˈĩdɐ ɛ ˈseɾu ˈpaɾɐ tuˈmaɾ ˈesɐ dɨsɨˈzɐ̃w

translations.text: It’s still too early to make that decision.

phrases.pt: Já não tenho tempo para isso agora.
phrases.ru: У меня сейчас нет на это времени.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʒa nɐ̃w ˈtẽɲu ˈtẽpu ˈpaɾɐ ˈisu ɐˈɡɔɾɐ

translations.text: I don’t have time for that now.

phrases.pt: Vou tratar disso antes de sair.
phrases.ipa_transcription: vo tɾɐˈtaɾ ˈdisu ˈɐ̃tɨʃ dɨ sɐˈiɾ

translations.text: I’ll take care of that before leaving.

phrases.pt: Cheguei um pouco mais cedo hoje.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʃɨˈɡej ˈũ ˈpoku ˈmajʃ ˈseɾu ˈoʒɨ

translations.text: I arrived a bit earlier today.

phrases.pt: Estamos a ficar sem tempo.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʃˈtɐmuʃ ɐ fiˈkaɾ sẽ ˈtẽpu

translations.text: We’re running out of time.

phrases.pt: Isso pode esperar mais um pouco.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu ˈpɔdɨ ʃpɨˈɾaɾ ˈmajʃ ˈũ ˈpoku

translations.text: That can wait a bit longer.

phrases.pt: Vou sair daqui a pouco.
phrases.ipa_transcription: vo sɐˈiɾ dɐˈki ɐ ˈpoku

translations.text: I’ll leave in a little while.

phrases.pt: Já não vale a pena agora.
phrases.ru: Сейчас это уже не имеет смысла.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʒa nɐ̃w ˈvalɨ ɐ ˈpɛnɐ ɐˈɡɔɾɐ

translations.text: It’s not worth it anymore now.

phrases.pt: Temos de nos apressar um pouco.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽmuʃ dɨ nuʃ ɐpɾɨˈsaɾ ˈũ ˈpoku

translations.text: We need to hurry up a bit.

phrases.pt: Ainda não chegou a hora certa.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐˈĩdɐ nɐ̃w ʃɨˈɡou ɐ ˈɔɾɐ ˈsɛɾtɐ

translations.text: The right time hasn’t come yet.

phrases.pt: Vou fazer isso assim que chegar.
phrases.ru: Я сделаю это, как только приеду.
phrases.ipa_transcription: vo fɐˈzeɾ ˈisu ɐˈsĩ kɨ ʃɨˈɡaɾ

translations.text: I’ll do this as soon as I arrive.

phrases.pt: Já estamos atrasados para isso.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʒa ʃˈtɐmuʃ ɐtɾɐˈzaduʃ ˈpaɾɐ ˈisu

translations.text: We’re already late for this.

phrases.pt: Prefiro não decidir isso agora.
phrases.ru: Я предпочитаю не решать это прямо сейчас.
phrases.ipa_transcription: pɾɨˈfiɾu nɐ̃w dɨsɨˈdiɾ ˈisu ɐˈɡɔɾɐ

translations.text: I prefer not to decide this right now.

phrases.pt: Isso pode ser resolvido mais tarde.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu ˈpɔdɨ seɾ ʁɨzuɫˈvidu ˈmajʃ ˈtaɾdɨ

translations.text: This can be resolved later.

phrases.pt: Vou ficar aqui mais um pouco.
phrases.ipa_transcription: vo fiˈkaɾ ɐˈki ˈmajʃ ˈũ ˈpoku

translations.text: I’ll stay here a bit longer.

phrases.pt: Estamos quase a chegar.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʃˈtɐmuʃ ˈkwazɨ ɐ ʃɨˈɡaɾ

translations.text: We’re almost there.

phrases.pt: Isso aconteceu há pouco tempo.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu ɐkõtɨˈseu a ˈpoku ˈtẽpu

translations.text: That happened not long ago.

phrases.pt: Já passou muito tempo desde então.
phrases.ru: С тех пор прошло уже много времени.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʒa pɐˈsou ˈmũjtu ˈtẽpu ˈdezɨ ẽˈtɐ̃w

translations.text: A lot of time has passed since then.
